name: archivist
description: Archivist is a cutting edge tool for documenting data collection in DDI.

REACT_APP_API_HOST.description: The URL to access the Rails API backend, this is the URL of the main heroku instance e.g. https://<INSERT HEROKU APP NAME>.herokuapp.com

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of processes to run.

MAX_THREADS.description: The number of threads to run.

FROM_ADDRESS.description: The email address used in the 'from' field for any outbound emails.

SIDEKIQ_USERNAME.description: The username for Sidekiq web interface authentication (/sidekiq_archivist where you can see background jobs).

SIDEKIQ_PASSWORD.description: The password for Sidekiq web interface authentication.
